objects.description: [Medusa Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1051) has stolen and encrypted victims' data in order to extort victims into paying a ransom.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 Medusa Group Medusa Ransomware January 2024)(Citation: Check Point Medusa Ransomware April 2025)(Citation: CISA Medusa Group Medusa Ransomware March 2025)(Citation: Intel471 Medusa Ransomware May 2025)(Citation: Broadcom Medusa Ransomware Medusa Group March 2025)(Citation: Security Scorecard Medusa Ransomware January 2024)
